description: A rich and hearty veggie mince filling is the perfect way to make shepherd's pie vegetarian-friendly.
name: Veggie Mince Shepherd's Pie with Celeriac Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.6 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, nonstick pan on medium heat and cook the onions and carrots for 6-8 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic, vegetarian mince and rosemary and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the wine and cook for 1 minute. Pour over the tomato puree, balsamic vinegar and stock, partially cover with the lid and simmer for 15 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Cook the celeriac in a large pot of boiling water for 10 minutes, until tender. Drain well, mash and stir in the creme fraiche.
Pour the mince mix into an ovenproof dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden.
